horizontally.description: Determines whether to check if the entity is moving horizontally.
horizontally.markdownDescription: Determines whether to check if the entity is moving horizontally.

vertically.description: Determines whether to check if the entity is moving vertically.
vertically.markdownDescription: Determines whether to check if the entity is moving vertically.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/moving)

Checks whether the entity is currently moving.

Type ID: `origins:moving`
